summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Montavista Place from the North line of Lot 6, Block 43, Carleton Park Addition, to the alley between Blocks 47 and 48, said addition, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, and amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 68314, approved June 7, 1938.
